name: Don't Think Just RUN (JdR2V)
description:
Entry for the exprmt48 2022 Game Jam!

Theme: Don't Think too Hard

Run! Just Run!!

Run trough the different levels and reach the goal before the time runs out!

Elude obstacles, jump and most importantly, don't think! JUST RUN!

Controls:

W/A/S/D: Move

Space Bar: Jump

Left Shift: Sprint

Note: I worked just a bear minimum of hours on this game, even if it was a week long I could only work like 3 days in total. It looks like a prototype because it basically is. Fortunately this game jam was very relaxed, I had a lot of fun with this one!
